sentences.sContent: John was as bouncy and ebullient as Helen was diffident and reserved.
sentences.sCn: 约翰活泼、热情；而海伦却羞怯、矜持。

synos.tran: 羞怯的；缺乏自信的；谦虚谨慎的

remMethod.val: di (看作de， 否定) + ffident (看作confident， 自信的) → 不自信的 → 缺乏自信的

words.tran: 缺乏自信地；踌躇地；羞怯地

trans.tranCn: 羞怯的；缺乏自信的；谦虚谨慎的
trans.tranOther: shy and not wanting to make people notice you or talk about you
